channel.title: Good Flight / Helicopter sims for PC W/360 controler?
channel.description:
Yea im looking for decent flight / helicopter sims for pc that i can use my xbox controller with?
They can be civilian or military.

desert/jungle strike are not even remotely sims (though they are awesome games)

i’m pretty sure its lifelike you have to pick up fuel barrels with hooks or else you will crash!

item.title: Good Flight / Helicopter sims for PC W/360 controler?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

HcoJustin:

I don’t think its the controls, but more of the, 8 hour real time flights from point A to B. Even speeding it up you could walk away for a few hours before you even got close

Yeah and it’s especially annoying when you’ve been flying for a long time and you fuck up the landing

Read full topic
item.source: Good Flight / Helicopter sims for PC W/360 controler?

item.title: Good Flight / Helicopter sims for PC W/360 controler?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“Brolapse, post:10, topic:423520”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=526152.msg3833459#msg3833459 date=1322724852]
Microsoft’s Flight Simulator series? I’m sure the controller has enough buttons for what you need, and then some. Flight Sim X looks amazing, and whenever Microsoft Flight comes out it should be a great step up
[/quote]
I thought flight sim X looked amazing but it’s pretty much the same disappoint as every other version, most people buy it, play it for 5 minutes then realize the controls are too complicated. The scenery is also pretty shitty, it never looks as good as they make it out to be in screenshots.

I thought microsoft discontinued flight sim? Jesus they are making another one, hope it’s good :D[/quote]

I don’t think its the controls, but more of the, 8 hour real time flights from point A to B. Even speeding it up you could walk away for a few hours before you even got close

Read full topic

item.title: Good Flight / Helicopter sims for PC W/360 controler?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Brolapse, post:3, topic:423520”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=526152.msg3832019#msg3832019 date=1322641181]
Are you looking for RC planes and helicopters, or full sized aircraft?
[/quote]
Wait there are RC planes simulators?[/quote]

there are plenty of rc simulators, it’s a decent way to learn how to fly/drive an expensive rc toy without any prior training

it’s mostly for £100+ 6+ channel helis

Read full topic

item.title: Good Flight / Helicopter sims for PC W/360 controler?
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

[quote=“Brolapse, post:3, topic:423520”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=526152.msg3832019#msg3832019 date=1322641181]
Are you looking for RC planes and helicopters, or full sized aircraft?
[/quote]
Wait there are RC planes simulators?

xzibit.jpg744×481
[/quote]

Haha i can imagine the quote for that picture, “Shiiiiiiiiiiiii…”

But yea, wouldnt mind combat sims, i think ive played flight gear but i couldnt get it to work.

I dont want RC sim tho, i’d prefer full sized aircraft.

Read full topic
item.source: Good Flight / Helicopter sims for PC W/360 controler?

item.title: Good Flight / Helicopter sims for PC W/360 controler?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“Brolapse, post:3, topic:423520”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=526152.msg3832019#msg3832019 date=1322641181]
Are you looking for RC planes and helicopters, or full sized aircraft?
[/quote]
Wait there are RC planes simulators?[/quote]

Sure is… They actually model most RC aircraft pretty well, and when it comes down to $10-50 a crash and 3 weeks downtime while your parts ship from China it can be pretty useful. RealFlight 6 is the most common, ClearView is a cheaper alternative that is more for teaching you how they handle rather than how pretty they look

Read full topic
item.source: Good Flight / Helicopter sims for PC W/360 controler?

item.title: Good Flight / Helicopter sims for PC W/360 controler?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

what are you looking for?

flightgear is free, and very good, however like most free software it has the potential to be better than the commercial offerings, but only if youre willing to put the time in to configuring and modding it. if not, most people are still using fsx, tbh. theres also xplane, which suffers from the same “problem” as flightgear in that its infinitely configurable and some people dont like that.

flightgear and fs9/fsx both support vatsim

unfortunately neither of them do helis very well imo, ive never found a great heli sim, it always seems to be an afterthought.

if youre looking for combat sims, then i dont know.

Read full topic
